actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Three Grass Blades or two Flaming Seedpods.

actions.name: Grass Blade
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, 10 ft., one target, 11 (2d6+4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Flaming Seedpod
actions.desc: Lobs a flaming seedpod at a point it can see within 60' of it. Seedpod explodes on impact and is destroyed. Each creature within 10 ft. of that point: 12 (5d4) fire (DC 15 Dex half).

reactions.name: Unstable Bulb
reactions.desc: When podthrower is grappled and removed from the ground while above 0 hp its bulb bursts. Each creature within 10 ft.: 12 (5d4) fire (DC 15 Dex half).

special_abilities.name: False Appearance
special_abilities.desc: While motionless indistinguishable from clump of crabgrass.

special_abilities.name: Flaming Seedpod Regrowth
special_abilities.desc: Has four Flaming Seedpods. Used Flaming Seedpods may regrow each turn. If podthrower starts its turn with less than four Flaming Seedpods roll a d6. On a roll of 5 or 6 it regrows 1d4 Flaming Seedpods to a max of 4.

special_abilities.name: Regeneration
special_abilities.desc: Regains 10 hp at the start of its turn. If it takes necrotic or if it is grappled and removed from the ground this trait doesn't function at start of its next turn. It dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hp and doesn't regenerate.
